name: Anne and the global warming
description:
In this game experience, the player plays "Anne" a climate migrant living in a village surrounded by power plants, which visibly emit polluting gases.

Life in the countryside is affected by prolonged drought and its side effects.

The narrative in this short game is told through radio and some Haikus for a more emotional component.

GAME STILL IN PROGRESS

If you think this game idea has some potential. Please, give us feedback, and make it easy for us to get the word out so we can continue to develop it! We would really appreciate that. :)
